title: Kalista/Poppy Ultimate interaction
body:
So i was in a game as Poppy (ARAM) and from what i can tell Kalista's Ulted target is bugged in that they can't be knocked away even when the ultimate hits them directly (and goes off)

As it was an ARAM Kalista had Galio as her Ult send in, and due to this we lost because my ult bugged not hitting the galio back, and he definitely took the shot because in the second instance of this happening, Kalista was directly behind him, and Galio took the hit but didn't go flying (and Kalista wasn't flying because she still ripped us apart)

Is this an intended interaction or a bug?

replies.body: Poppy's ult from my experience is touch and go if it wins in those situations. Get the timing slightly wrong and you'll  lose (as in that instance when Galio hadn't landed). I've grabbed Poppy twice as Blitzcrank whilst channeling her ult. Once the grab broke and I got knocked back, the other time, I got knocked back but dragged Poppy with me the whole distance.
Considering that the canon ball that Kalista throws is untargetable until they land, I'd say it's intentional.
